```
int operand = 1;
++operand; // operand = 2
int number = ++operand; // operand = 3, number = 3
```

```
int operand = 2;
--operand; // operand = 1
int number = --operand; // operand = 0, number = 0
```

```
int operand = 1;
operand++; // operand = 2
int number = operand++; // operand = 3, number = 2
```

```
int operand = 2;
operand--; //operand = 1
int number = operand--; // operand = 0, number 1
```
